title: WINDOWS DVD DUAL BOOT WINDOWS XP + WINDOWS 7 32 BIT ONLY
description:
AS THE TITLE SAY THE ISO IMAGE CONTAINS A BOOTABLE DVD IMAGE,FROM WITCH YOU CA CHOOSE WHAT OS WHANT TO INSTALL =>XP OR W7
PLEASE READ THIS NOTES CAREFULY:
-WHEN YOU SET THE PC TO BOOT FROM DVD A MENU WILL APEAR,BUT MOST OF IT IS WRITENN IN MY LANGUAGE.SO HERE IS THE TRANSLATION:
1. PRESS 1 TO INTALL WINDOWS XP
2. PRESS 2 TO INSTALL WINDOWS 7
3. PRESS 3 TO BOOT FROM HARD DRIVE
4. PRESS 4 TO REBOOT THE PC
-THE INSTALATION OF BOTH OS WILL GO NORMALY AFTER YOU PRESS THE CHOOSEN NR(1 OR 2)

-WINDOWS XP REQUIRES A KEY.THAT IS:(READ TEXT INCLUDED IN TORENT)
-WINDOWS XP COMES CLEAN,NO TWEAKS,THEMES, NO UPDATES ADDED
-WINDOWS XP IS UPDATABLE,I CEKED BEFORE UPLOADING THIS TORRENT

-WINDOWS 7 COMES TWEAKED,ADED THEMES,PREACTIVATED,UPDATED(NOT ALL UPDATES TO THIS DATE WHERE ADED), SOME DRIVERS ADED
-UPDATABLE(DONT INSTALL KB971033 UPDATE)

IF YOU WHANT TO MAKE A BOOTABLE STIK Y RECOMMEND RUFUS (FREE=GOOGLE)
IF YOU MAKE A DVD BOOTABLE Y RECOMMEND IMGBURN (FREE=GOOGLE),AND BURN THE DVD AT THE LOWEST SPEED


VERSIONS PRESENT:WINDOWS XP PROF SP3+WINDOWS 7 ULTIMATE SP1

PLEASE SEED AFTER
